tossupQ:
MATH Multiple Choice The number 0.13 is written with a bar drawn over the last two 
digits. This means that: 
 
W) the number terminates at 3 
X) the pair of digits 13 repeats forever 
Y) the number 3 repeats forever 
Z)  the number is negative
tossupA: X) THE PAIR OF DIGITS 13 REPEATS FOREVER
